alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tom Green and northeastern Irion Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 949 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-67 Near The Irion- Tom Green County Line, or near Sherwood, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mertzon, Arden, Tankersley, Sherwood and Us-67 Near The Irion- Tom Green County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
